# detectsCustomRoutes

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether route detection includes custom routes.

## Declaration

```swift
var detectsCustomRoutes: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false]. Only set it to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if your app uses an instance of [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AVRouting/AVCustomRoutingController].

## Detecting routes

- **isRouteDetectionEnabled**: A Boolean value that indicates whether route detection is in an enabled state.
- **multipleRoutesDetected**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the object detects more than one playback route.
- **AVRouteDetectorMultipleRoutesDetectedDidChange**: A notification the system posts when changes occur to its detected routes.
